title: I Told The Ugliest Town In The UK It Was Beautiful
description: In this video, Max Fosh goes to what he claims is the ugliest town in the UK and tells the residents that their town is actually beautiful.
summary: Max Fosh visits a town and tells the residents it's beautiful despite its reputation for being ugly.
payoff: The payoff comes from the reactions of the residents as they react to being told their town is beautiful despite its reputation. Some are confused, some are grateful, and some are just amused by the whole situation.
